item.title: Named Entity Recognition Tools for Patents
item.description: Patents are rich in legal and technical terms and this causes the need for considerable amount of human effort in their analysis. The main stakeholders potentially interested in patents are engineers, designers and marketers. Un- fortunately, due to the legal and technical language, these stakeholders have limited access to the information contained in patents. This research projec has the aim of developing a process based on natural language processing techniques that automatically detects and extracts relevant entities from patetns.
